quick_answer.text: A standard Whopper has about 670 calories and 28 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories are in the Whopper?
faqs.a: Approximately 670 calories for a standard Whopper.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Whopper?
faqs.a: About 28 g of protein per Whopper burger.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in the Whopper?
faqs.a: Around 980 mg of sodium, so watch intake if limiting salt.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in the Whopper?
faqs.a: Yes, about 51 g carbs, mainly from the bun and condiments.
